trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Calhoun
There were no other sightings in Calhoun on or around May 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked like a star but was color as sun with blue red and white lights scrolling around. Also a bright light like a spotlight. It was just hovering over. I got out of my card and it looked like it spot lighted me and looked as it was coming toward me so I ran back to my car and turned to look at it and it was still in same spot. It has been there for three nights that I know of.
Summary: Looked like a star but was color as sun with blue red and white ligst scrolling around. Also a bright light like a spotlight. It was just hovering over.
